sourcesContent:
import { LinearGradient } from 'expo-linear-gradient'
import { View, Text, TouchableOpacity, TextInput } from 'react-native'

export default function LoginCliente(){
    return(
        <View style={{}}>
            <LinearGradient style={{width: '100%', height: '100%', alignItems: 'center'}} colors={['#EFEBFDE5', '#FFFFFF00']}>
                <View style={{height: 430}}></View>

                <View style={{display: 'flex', height: 90, justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
                    <TextInput placeholder='E-mail' style={{width: 328, padding: 8, color: '#C9C9C9', borderRadius: 4, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#F4F4F4'}}></TextInput>
                    <TextInput placeholder='Senha' style={{width: 328, padding: 8, color: '#C9C9C9', borderRadius: 4, borderWidth: 1, borderColor: '#F4F4F4'}}></TextInput>
                </View>
                
                <Text style={{fontWeight: 'bold', color: '#5F5DEE', fontSize: 12, height: 50}}>Esqueci a senha</Text>
                
                <View style={{height: 165, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'space-between'}}>
                    <TouchableOpacity style={{backgroundColor: '#5F5DEE', borderRadius: '4px', shadowColor: '#A1A1A1C2', shadowOffset: {width: 2, height: 2}, shadowRadius: 8, width: 328, height: 56, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center'}}>
                        <Text style={{color: 'white', textAlign: 'center', fontSize: 16}}>Logar</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>

                    <TouchableOpacity style={{backgroundColor: '#FFFFF', borderRadius: '4px', shadowColor: '#A1A1A1C2', shadowOffset: {width: 2, height: 2}, shadowRadius: 8, width: 328, height: 56, display: 'flex', justifyContent: 'center'}}>
                        <Text style={{color: '#5F5DEE',  textAlign: 'center', fontSize: 16}}>NÃ£o possuo conta!</Text>
                    </TouchableOpacity>
                    
                    <TouchableOpacity>
                        <Text style={{fontSize: 12, color: '#5F5DEE', fontWeight: 'bold'}}>Sou transportador!</Text>

                    </TouchableOpacity>
                </View>
            </LinearGradient>
        </View>
    )
}
